remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口用于为应用程序提供自定义安全证书验证。The interface is used to provide custom security certificate validation for an application. 默认策略为允许有效证书以及已过期的有效证书。The default policy is to allow valid certificates, as well as valid certificates that have expired. 若要更改此策略，请 使用不同的策略来实现接口，然后将该策略分配给 。To change this policy, implement the interface with a different policy, and then assign that policy to . (SSPI) 使用安全支持提供程序接口。 uses the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). 有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 上的 SSPI 文档。For more information, see the SSPI documentation on MSDN. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个证书策略，该策略 `false` 为任何证书问题返回，并打印一条指示控制台上的问题的消息。The following example creates a certificate policy that returns `false` for any certificate problem and prints a message that indicates the problem on the console. CertificateProblem 枚举定义了用于证书问题的 SSPI 常量，private GetProblemMessage 方法创建了有关该问题的可打印消息。The CertificateProblem enum defines SSPI constants for certificate problems, and the private GetProblemMessage method creates a printable message about the problem.
